scripts.webpack: <%= pkgManager %> run clean && webpack --mode production --config ./client/webpack.config.js && webpack --mode production --config ./server/webpack.config.js
scripts.webpack:dev: <%= pkgManager %> run clean && webpack --mode none --config ./client/webpack.config.js && webpack --mode none --config ./server/webpack.config.js
scripts.lint: <%= pkgManager %> run lint:client && <%= pkgManager %> run lint:server
scripts.postinstall: cd client && <%= pkgManager %> install && cd ../server && <%= pkgManager %> install && cd ..
